JobFullDesc: Are you interested in joining a startup within Microsoft where you'll have the rare opportunity to redefine the Modern Workplace. At Cloud Managed Desktop(CMD) we are creating an Intelligent Azure based Desktop Virtualization and Management platform to help revolutionize how end user computing environments are managed and streamed to the end user. Data and deep Insights to help personalize and secure this experience for the end user and ITPros is critical for our success and differentiates us from our competitors in AWS/Vmware. We are looking for a strong, highly motivated engineer with a passion to build big data platforms and ML models, who is comfortable dealing with ambiguity and a shifting landscape. Has experience with Azure or other cloud services at scale, is passionate about iterating fast in a startup environments, and getting the right design for our customers.
